botan.pubkey.blinding

Blinding for public key operations

struct Blinder;
Blinding Function Object

this()(auto ref const BigInt e, auto ref const BigInt d, auto ref const BigInt n);
Construct a blinder

Params:
BigInt e the forward (blinding) mask
BigInt d the inverse of mask (depends on algo)
BigInt n modulus of the group operations are performed in
